import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Card, Button, CardDeck } from "react-bootstrap"; import CloudUploadIcon from "@material-ui/icons/CloudUpload"; import axios from "axios"; class Cards extends Component { handleselectedFile = event => { let files=event.target.files; let reader=new FileReader() reader.readAsDataURL(files[0]) reader.onload=(e)=>{ } }; handleUpload = () => { console.log("uploaded"); const data = new FormData(); data.append("file", this.state.selectedFile, this.state.selectedFile.name,); axios .post("http://192.168.1.20:5000/upload", data, { onUploadProgress: ProgressEvent => { this.setState({ loaded: (ProgressEvent.loaded / ProgressEvent.total) * 100 }); } }) .then(res => { console.log(res.statusText); }); }; handleDownload = () => { console.log("Downloaded"); axios({ url: 'http://192.168.1.20:5000/download', method: 'GET', responseType: 'blob', // important }).then((response) => { const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data])); const link = document.createElement('a'); link.href = url; link.setAttribute('download', 'file.pdf'); document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); }); }; state = {}; render() { return (
